Review Body: 15k is very low price for an i3. 15.1k should have been a better price if the the seller intends to break the back of ultra low budget pc builders. 😌

This is a great processor that can handle just about any task imaginable. Just did a computer build and used this processor. And I have nothing bad to say about it. Would definitely use again on future builds.
It's a good processor for a server but I think it should be cheaper.

I bought this because my i9-12900k was giving me problems.  It was more for troubleshooting.  The i3-12100 actually works better than my problematic i9-12900k that had lagging and stuttering issues that made it nearly impossible to work with Microsoft Word or Excel.  I never thought I'd see the day that an i3 would outperform an i7 or i9 but this little budget CPU works better than them.
Great product, It's really worth the price.
Es ideal para cuando tienes poco presupuesto, tiene buena potencia y para las cosas y juegos básicos
金額で考えると上出来でしょうね！軽いゲームならそこそこ動きますし。ホントのとこは13世代が欲しかったのですが13は品薄でこれにしました(;'∀')。。。。。がッ！！標準的な事は十二分に熟せるので費用対効果を考えれば満足ですねｗ。あとは。。。マザボの選択です。生かすも殺すもマザボで決まります。後続者の方々。。。。頑張ってマザボ選びに気ぃ使って下さい！！ｗｗ。
Ottimo processore economico per lavori non troppo pesanti.
Ok

it's an i3, so don't expect i9 performance.  With that said, I am using it in a custom built NAS running Ubuntu, and it seems to run great.  It comes with a CPU cooler that works just fine for my purpose.  I am in a tight build in a small case with 4 HDDs, and temp under large file transfer loads are ~34 degrees.

Je l'ai acheté pour monter un bon PC bureautique voire plus si affinités...Avec ses 4 cœurs/8 Threads de 12ème génération : ça fait une sacrée différence par rapport à un i3 de 6ème génération (qui n'avait que 2 cœurs 4 threads).Maintenant les i3 sont même bien utilisables pour du gaming s'ils sont couplés avec une carte graphique style RTX3060 ou RX6650XT voir RTX 4060Ti ou RX7700XT.Il chauffe vraiment peu et est tellement bien calibré que le ventirad d'origine suffit à le refroidir même lors d'un stress test CPU-Z.

Compré estos procesadores y pude ensamblar la computadora de mi hijo con 16GB ram y puede jugar al fornite, la tarjeta de video que usé es de 6GB, recomiendo ampliamente el procesador por el precio y lo rápido que es
funcionando bem até hoje março de 2024
as advertised
I picked it up for $120 on sale. That's a good priceIt works great
it works well  in my Linux system. I photo edit using gimp.
I never had any issues with Intel CPUs. This one works great with my 3060 12 GB GPU.

Compared to the i3 of just a few generations ago, it's amazing how far these mid-entry-level CPUs have come.I upgraded my Plex server to a new motherboard and this i3-12100 and performance is excellent.Included CPU cooler isn't great but it's good enough.

Good For 4K TV at 60HZ UHD 730 built in graphics. My Son uses it for gaming Gaming  RTX 2070 8GB  and16GB Ram on Motherboard.  Good Value hardly difference with pricier 13100. I am using a GTX 1060 6GB for AI tutorials with 16GB RAM. My son and I are Happy with our respective use cases.
I've built 3 computers for clients on a budget using this CPU. It's power per dollar is great and it's on board graphics are good enough to run most games okay if you are on a really tight budget.
Quick and snappy processor for those on a budget. I currently have it in my PC I built myself and I'm very happy with it.

Le processeur en temps que telle fonctionne très bien mais je suis déçu sur ses points:Lemballage du processeur une fois déballer avait une odeur de cigarettes très présente.L'emballage est arriver avec tout les coins endommagerLa pâte thermiques déjà installer sur le cooler n'étais pas protéger avec du plastic donc il y avait de la saletés coller dessusJe suis un peut déçu même si le processeur lui même est ok
Works as intended even better than I thought it would really good budget cpu
Works great in MSI mobo

It's amazing but for games not so amazing. Even applications are not entirely the best they could be faster if maybe you have an old GPU that's about 5 years old you could speed this i3 up but it's still not the best it could be but it is cheap I guess. Get an i5 or i7 1100+ instead.
Buen producto para comenzar a armar una computadora básica
Good.
Works great out the box and super quiet cooler.
Buenas temperaturas con el disipador de fabrica y buen rendimiento al jugar y trabajar

Ce i3 est parfait que ce soit pour de la bureautique ou du gaming.Le 12100 est plus cher que le 12100f puisqu'il y a un gpu intégré (uhd730) c'est a dire qu'il n'y a pas besoin de brancher une carte graphique ce qui est parfait pour un pc de bureau, qui quand même peut de faire  tourner GTAV en 1080p.Et si l'on souhaite ajouter une carte graphique pour du gaming c'est tout a fait possible, rtx4060 max
Cumple con las especificaciones y este modelo trae GPU integrada

I'm very impressed with this CPU. If I had the money I would get the I5-12600 Non-K for video work because of the extra cores but the I3-12100 is freaking amazing. This is the most powerful CPU I have ever used. It can do the video editing I need done for now until I get better. It uses hardly any power, stays cool and is capable of much more than I need for now. I had never been able to do video editing before because the computer would lock up regardless of how fast the HDD was or how much RAM I had.
Llegó a tiempo y en buen estado funciona bien es original sin ningún detalle. Buen rendimiento

I have this installed into an Asrock motherboard. It works great. I was a little misinformed about the built in graphics and thought when I bought it was I was getting Iris Xe, but it's something called UHD. The product description clearly says UHD, so my bad really. Most of the other Intel 12th gen chips with graphics processing have Iris Xe which has many more graphics processing units. For sure the UHD is fine for many things including streaming video. Not sure about 3D gaming, though. Had I know it was UHD and not Iris, I might have saved $30 or so and bought the version without the graphics. On the other hand, I liked the idea of onboard graphics as a backup or alternative. In either case, this i3 runs like a champ compared to the quad core phenom ii based system it's replacing.I'm not sure it's relevant here but I think I should mention that my Asrock board can't make use of the on board UHD graphics when you set BIOS to legacy mode. You need to use the UEFI mode in order to use the on board graphics. Not sure if that's typical of other boards or board brands. With my Asrock board, you need a discrete graphics card to use the legacy bios mode to boot from an old non-UEFI installation of windows. If that doesn't make sense to you, don't worry about it.
4 cores with hyper-threading. Works great. Very snappy and fast.Thank You.
Bon processeur. L'avantage de l'entrée de gamme comme ça c'est qu'il consomme moins, quand il ne sera plus assez puissant je pourrai le recycler en serveur multimédia
For i3 processor this 12k model really performs, paired with a intel arc a770 16GB model has surprised me with the ability to stream while gaming New World with seedless ease.
Strong single core. Decent multicore. For day to day use like browsing and MS Office this is perfect. Very good in gaming too. Why spend more.
Buen procesador lo recomiendo.!
very good product

J'ai acheté ce processeur pour pouvoir le mettre dans un pc de bureau. Les performances sont au rendez-vous.Le partie graphique du processeur permet de mettre 2 écrans sans qu'il y ai de bug ou de ralentissement.Le processeur est vraiment un bon compromis, il peut aussi bien être performant en application bureautique que en jeux si vous le couplez avec un carte graphique.

Even in 2023, it's astounding how much performance this i3 delivers. On Cinebench's single-thread test, I get the same score as an 11900k, which is insane! It's good for gaming and exceptionally powerful for an office PC.

Came in early.. box damaged but luckily cpu was in good condition.. used to update bios on h670 board to finally use a 13th gen cpu.. worked well.. and now its on its own motherboard.. no videocard for now but it works pretty well.. and didnt expect this to come with a fan.. thought it didnt have.. paired this with a b760m d3sh..Edit: surprisingly a very good daily performer.. thought less cores could be shaky but actually it performs well.. even games that can run on igpu are also giving an acceptable result which is very good for its price.. good balue purchase..Thanks seller!
YOUTUBEでサンディーのi7と同等の処理能力とか聞いて、話半分やろうと思いつつIVY i7からの乗り換えで購入。HD動画での変換時間が同等でした。
A colombia llego en 5 dias, excelente procesador
Purchased for a server build. Works like a charm. Supports Quicksync for Plex transcoding which is phenomenal. For the price, it was the perfect option! No issues since installation.

SandyBridgeのCoreI7-2600から老朽取り換えですが、性能良すぎて当初想定していなかった用途にも使ってます。内蔵グラフィックで軽めの3Dゲームができますし、FHDの動画編集もできます(Aviutl,DavinciResolve)。MinecraftやA列車9/はじまるA列車はもちろん、シティスカもできましたしTpf2もメインメモリーがあればプレイできます。i7-2600と比較して、シングルコアが３倍なのに消費電力は同等以下です。１０年を経た進歩でしょうか。

CPUとマザーボードを交換してWindows10から11にアップグレードしました。CPUクーラーをリテールに変えた以外、メモリもDDR4‐2133・８GB×2です。またシステムが入っていたM.２NVMeSSD・256GBは新しいマザーボードに差し替えただけで認識し、認証手続きなど一切行わないで日々のアップデートが行えます。ゲームはほとんどしませんがCPU‐Zで見る限り性能は勝るとも劣らないようです。
Ótimo para aplicações simples como exibir video em múltiplas telas ou então executar programas leves

Great little CPU. I just wanted an entertainment server so I built a quick and dirty $500 computer, but I might actually use this for my video editing and gaming machine instead. Immediately ran benchmarks and was pleasantly surprised. This thing can game and it can be a workhorse. It comes with a fan that's just fine but I had already purchased a separate fan/cooler before realizing this came with one, so I'm using that instead. This is one of those no-brainer items where you're guaranteed quality and performance at a very low price. I wish all items were as good.
Comprei para uso domestico para ter muiot tempo de durabilidade, porém roda muitos programas pesados. vale a pena

El procesador lleva trabajando más de 6 meses sin problema casi todos los días más de 8 horas al día, cumple bastante bien con un trabajo sencillo y es muy estable lo instale en una mother board h610 de msi
Works as intended.

Tengo un i7-10700K. En Single-Core gana al 10700k (Estoy flipao). En Aida64 en el apartado memorias funciona igual que el 10700k a 50000 MB mas o menos con memorias 12-100 3600mhz y i7-10700k 3900Mhz. En ciertas pruebas de Aida64 gana el 12100, y en las que demanda mas cpu los 8 cores del 10700K se imponen. Pero que este chiquitín le plante cara a mi 10700K no está nada mal.  Y todo un Mini-PC que me salió por 380€.Para mucha gente este micro es mas que suficiente. Tiene potencia.
nan
Graphics seem good enough for my present needs. Better than the nvidia card I had in my old pc.
All very well, procesador works fine AND, seller included a good cooler, larger than stock, pleasantly surprised.
This Intel Core i3 (12th Gen) i3-12100 Quad-core (4 Core) 3.30 GHz Processor works great for my gaming system.
Good performance for the price point. Bring a magnifying glass to find the alignment arrow.
Great budget CPU, no bottle neck for my GPU (GeForce GTX 1080). Above 100+ fps on most games at 1080p at mid to max resolution. Very happy.

Windows11にできない旧自作PCからの買い替え。今12世代を買うとしたらコスパ重視ということになると思いますが、ゲーミングPCでないならば十分な性能だと思います。リテールクーラーは付属しているのは知っていましたが、見た目がかっこよくなっていてびっくり。私の場合は、高負荷な作業はほとんど発生しないのでいまのところうるさいと感じたことはありません。ただし、12世代共通のCPUが反る問題を許容するために、グリスは別途調達して、広め、厚めに塗っておきました。
低消費電力のTが欲しかったのですが、購入当時は流通していなかったので無印にしました。タイトルのとおり、事務用途ではまったく問題ありません。YouTube視聴でもCPUの使用率は3～10％、内蔵GPUは5%程度で余裕があります。ライトユーザーや事務系にはお勧めのCPUです。
Privé
今までのがうるさかったということもありますが、付属のファンで十分静かです。
Me gustó que está bien empaquetado y llega a tiempo o antes.
ことは足りるができればサーマルクーラーは卒業したい

This CPU is incredibly fast and is great for browsing the web and YouTube, completing office tasks or schoolwork, and even light to medium gaming. It only has 4 cores but they are so fast that it can compete with other processors like the 5600G. The integrated graphics aren't amazing but they get the job done and have allowed me to run light games like Roblox and Civ VI while I save for a graphics card. The stock cooler is not amazing at cooling but the i3 12100 doesn't take much power so while any new cooler would probably be an improvement, this one has been doing just fine. For anyone building a PC on a budget, I can easily say this is a great CPU. It won't run all the latest games at max settings but since it can be found for so cheap, it makes for a very cost effective processor.
コスパ最高です。自作PCの最初はこのCPUで十分で、価格が下がってきたら後に乗せかえる予定です
It's an Intel, it's fast and it's very affordable.  What more could you ask for?

Great processor for entry level gaming, I use it with a 1660 super and 16gb of ram works great with most games delivering up to 300 fps in some less demanding games, do expect games like fortnite, warzone, or valorant to run flawlessly with fps in some instances going as high as 300fps in certain games, never experienced stutters or any sorts of limitations, all in all got 151 total it is a great price to performance proccesor.

I was on the fence about buying this cpu because i have a i3 10100 10th generation and it is slow when i game but man this 12100 12th gen CPU is a powerhouse i paired this cpu with a b660 mobo and 16gigs of ram Let me tell you it handles everything i throw at it i can have 2 games open plus a movie and it doesnt lag
一般的なPC作業や動画視聴はサクサク動きます。ゲームは、GTX1650以上のグラボと合わせればストレス無くプレイできます。が、ハイスペックなグラボではボトルネックになります。あと、内蔵グラフィックは通常作業では問題ないがオマケ程度なので、過度な期待はやめましょう。

Decent proc but the benchmarks will have you believe that it's better than the i7 8700k. This is not the case. Maybe it is in single core performance and anything up to 8 threads but the cores max out easily and slow everything down. Save up a little more and buy an i5 12600k or an i7 and I promise you'll be happier.

Tendrás más fps en la mayoría de juegos que con cpu Intel de generación 11 y AMD ryzen 5000 en las categorías de (i3 i5, ryzen 3 y ryzen 5) con excepción del i5 11600k y el ryzen 5 5600x o cpus superiores
I can't see spending a lot of money on a processor just for surfing the web or downloading email. This one fit the bill and works great. Very speedy and so far very reliable.

Acheté pour monter une configuration de base, ce processeur tient ses promesses en termes de puissance.J'ai apprécié la fourniture du ventilateur et la facilité déconcertante d'installation sur la carte-mère.Je manque de recul pour apprécier le niveau de bruit sous forte charge processeur mais le ventilateur reste discret en usage ordinaire, en utilisant le chip graphique intégré.Au jour de l'achat, je l'ai choisi pour son excellent rapport qualité-prix.
Reçu en bonne état et vraiment un bon processeur

This product was very affordable, my entire build was ~$1,006 USD.  At this price point $130-140 totally beats out anything in the past that I have build anywhere near that price for the performance on the chip, especially looking at past choices.  it has enough PCIE lanes in the CPU that I can have an SSD and an RTX 3060 and plays very well at 1080P gaming.  I'm getting solid FPS for the games that are played where it does matter to me so for what the intended use is for it's perfect.  Too bad intel is only winning my business at the low end.
シングルスレッド性能はそんなに低くない。マルチスレッド性能はその分GPUにお金をかけられるのでその方がお得。特にDPL向けには。
コスパ最強です
Excellent processeur mais attention, la fréquence maximale de la RAM sera limitée à 1333 Mhz contrairement à ce que déclare Intel (3200 Mhz avec DDR4)...

i5-12400にしたかったが値上がりしてi3-12100でもコア数は5割増てもクロック3.3から2.5Gに落ちるので差は小さいのでは?価格は5～6割増だからi3-12の方がオトクに感じる。エンコード性能はi5-9600kと大差ないがキビキビ動くし動画も瞬時に先に飛ばせるので快適。画質も良くなってきたのでハードウェアエンコードでも良さそう。QSVならCPU温度も低いがCPUを使うと高くなるので真夏に純正CPUクーラーでは不安。CPUクーラーのデザインはかっこいいし配線し易い。取付部品も新型で挿しやすかった。
初めて作った自作パソコンで使いました。

At 4 cores and 8 threads, this processor is equivalent to the top tier i7 processors of just a few years ago.  Mine is paired with 16 GB of RAM and an RX 6600, and it handles everything I do (1080 gaming) very comfortably.The heat sink that is included is very minimalist, but it does the job. Idle temperature is about 40C and the processor peaks at about 65C under load. That being said, the fan is very audible at max speed (3,000 RPM) to maintain that stable temperature under load. One might be wise to consider a different heat sink on a gaming computer. Almost any air-cooled device would be sufficient. Liquid cooling would be overkill.Otherwise, it will handle everyday home office tasks with little effort.

Acheté en juin 2022 et à l'heure actuelle c'est un excellent rapport qualité prix (le meilleur dans les moins de 150€ avec partie graphique) et largement suffisant pour de la bureautique et un peu de gaming. Malgré que ce soit un I3, il reste performant (plus performant qu'un I5 10400).Le I5 12400 est aussi une solution très bonne et plus performante, mais vers les 200€.Le I3 12100 est pour l'instant un bon processeur dans les "petits prix" tout en ayant un minimum de performance, même pour du gaming.L'inconvénient c'est que les cartes mères pour la 12ème génération sont assez chères (un peu plus chères que les anciennes générations). Perso j'ai pris une B660m

Actualmente rinde como i5 de novena o hasta décima generación. Y maneja toda la tecnología actual. Estoy esperando para probarlo ya que aún no poseo la board peor ya aseguré el corazón de la máquina, con estos cambios de stock y precio era lo mejor.
The best for that price
This CPU set up nicely with Windows 11.

How many of you just need a fast processor for standard home/office work? Buy this and call it a day.If you need something to handle Microsoft Office, any browser (your internet connection matters more), and basic applications, the 12100 is all you need. Loading time is very good. You really don't need amazing graphics to perform any of these tasks. I'm using integrated video and it suits me just fine. My other computer uses the APU on an AMD 5600G and I've never had issues. I paired this CPU with a barebones Gigabyte motherboard (cheapest I could find) and 8GB of DDR4 memory and it rivals my AMD setup for plain tasks.Don't feel like you need an i5, i7, or even the i3 12400 if you just need an everyday computer for watching videos, doing online banking, or crunching out work material (unless you are editing heavy media). This i3-12100 is the equivalent of a quad core processor from years back. If you are working on virtual machines, doing strong programming, have a million windows open, need to use Adobe Creative Suite to quickly produce and export content, then you may want to consider moving up to a stronger processor. Even so, this one is still pretty good - it will just take longer to complete some things.I'm overall very happy with this processor and I think most households who have similar requirements will be satisfied. The 12400 did get to $160 at some point so that could be something to look at to future proof a machine since it has six cores (not that I need them right now).
Very good entry level start
普段ネット閲覧か動画視聴くらいしかしないので、高性能なものはいらないと思い購入。日常で使う範囲ならまったく不自由なく使えています。

As luck would have it I was preparing a 10th gen i3-10100 system the day before. Just got done building an new system with the i3-12100 and what a drastic and noticeable increase in speed over the 10th gen part! Well done Intel! And the new stock cooler with a copper slug and nicer looking shroud is much appreciated. Temps are very cool on this low end system at 42 C under load and 29 C at idle.

最新世代のCPUでコスパに優れているため、初めての自作PCに使用しました。ASUSのGTX 1650と一緒にApexやFortniteなどのゲームをプレイしていますが、GPUの性能を補うためにCPUが使われるとリテイルクーラーの音がとてもうるさくなります。初めての自作PCで、簡易水冷クーラーと迷いましたが、コスパ重視などの点でリテイルクーラーにしました。YouTubeやブラウザを見たりする分には申し分ないスペックですが、やはりゲームをする際の音は気になりました。そこまでハイパワーを必要とするゲームを遊んでいないので詳しくは分かりませんが、性能に関しては全く問題ないと思いました！！
PCでゲームはしないので値段の安いCore i3にしました。思ったより処理が速くてその点では非常に満足です。ただし、内臓GPUは使いたいソフトが数種うまく動作しなかったため現時点ではドライバーの完成度が低いのかなと感じました。
